sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>ability</radical> to <radical>boil</radical> is one of the main abilities of a <kanji>bear</kanji>.
meaningInfo: I bet you didn't know this, but a bear can boil whenever it wants. Imagine a bear heating itself up and boiling, its fur and skin bubbling and letting off steam.
readingMnemonic:
A <kanji>bear</kanji> boiling in front of you should fill you with great honor. Or, as they say in Latin: Magma <reading>cum</reading> (<ja>くま</ja>) laude.

Get it? A little hot bear humor for you.
readingInfo: You can also imagine a bear graduating in the top 5-10% of its class. Or, just imagine a bear saying "Cuma here!" to you.
